snippet: The measure signed by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo will let the park on the West Side of Manhattan collect some much-needed revenue.
abstract: Gov Andrew M Cuomo signs legislation allowing Hudson River on West Side of Manhattan to sell air rights for development up to one block east of park's boundaries; bill is intended to help park, city-state hybrid that was meant to be self-supporting, solve its financial woes.
lead_paragraph: The measure signed by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo will let the park on the West Side of Manhattan collect some much-needed revenue.

headline.main: Law Says Hudson River Park Is Allowed to Sell Air Rights
headline.print_headline: Law Says Hudson River Park Is Allowed to Sell Air Rights
